cont.entity_a: Freezes ice cream faster than older models. Produces ice cream with a soft consistency.
cont.entity_b: Produces incredible ice cream, though it is noisy. Takes about 30 minutes to make ice cream.

cont.entity_a: Handle on the bucket makes it easier to remove from the freezer.
Requires pre-planning to ensure the canister is frozen and mixture is chilled.
cont.entity_b: Requires freezing the bowl for 24 hours and chilling the custard overnight.

cont.entity_a: Does not make a large quantity, suitable for about four people.

Texture.comm: Ice cream texture is smooth and creamy when directions are followed.

cont.entity_b: Ice cream consistency improves with proper freezing and chilling of ingredients. Ice cream needs to be frozen after churning for firmer consistency.

cont.entity_a: Arrived well-packaged and functioned as expected.
Instructions recommend chilling custard to 40 F and the freezer part to 0 F for best results.
cont.entity_b: Offers a good variety of recipes for different ice cream types.

Cleanup.comm: No need for ice or salt.

cont.entity_b: Some users reported noise issues during operation.

cont.entity_a: Can make a second batch without refreezing the bowl if the ice cream is consumed quickly.
cont.entity_b: The bowl needs to be frozen for at least 48 hours for optimal results.

cont.entity_a: Can be challenging to use in warm climates without AC.

Durability.comm: Some users experienced issues with the motor and cylinder quality.

cont.entity_b: Some users experienced issues with the machine's durability and performance.
Can make a variety of desserts including sorbets and gelatos.
